import java.util.*;
class Main
{
	public static char[] toCharArray(String str)
	{
		int i;
		char[] arr=new char[str.length()];
		for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
			arr[i]=str.charAt(i);
		return arr;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t,i,len,count1,count2,min;
		String str,str1,str2;
		char[] arr,temp1,temp2;
		int[] power=new int[27];
		int[] arr1=new int[27];
		int[] arr2=new int[27];
		for(i=0;i<27;i++)
			power[i]=0;
		t=sc.nextInt();
		str=sc.next();
		len=str.length();
		arr=Main.toCharArray(str);
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
			power[(int)arr[i]-96]=i;
		while(t-->0)
		{
			str1=sc.next();
			str2=sc.next();
			for(i=0;i<27;i++)
				arr1[i]=0;
			for(i=0;i<27;i++)
				arr2[i]=0;
			temp1=Main.toCharArray(str1);
			temp2=Main.toCharArray(str2);
			for(i=0;i<str1.length();i++)
				arr1[(int)temp1[i]-96]+=1;
			for(i=0;i<str2.length();i++)
				arr2[(int)temp2[i]-96]+=1;
			for(i=1;i<27;i++)
			{
				if(arr1[i]>0&&arr2[i]>0)
				{
					min=arr1[i]<=arr2[i]?arr1[i]:arr2[i];
					arr1[i]=arr1[i]-min;
					arr2[i]=arr2[i]-min;
				}
			}
			count1=0;
			count2=0;
			for(i=1;i<27;i++)
			{
				if(arr1[i]>0)
					count1+=power[i];
				if(arr2[i]>0)
					count2+=power[i];
			}
			if(count1>count2)
				System.out.println("ALICE");
			else if(count1<count2)
				System.out.println("BOB");
			else
				System.out.println("TIE");
		}
	}
}
